comments:
Build ID: I20070621-1340

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Open WSDL
2. Browse methods and double-click list element (CompanyNameList)
3. Stack overflow occurs

Screenshot is attached, WSDL cannot be made available

The error seems to be reproducible (at least with this WSDL) whenever a type contains a list of sub types only. If a secondary sub type is available, the crash does not occur.

Created an attachment (id=78739)
Screenshot of element producing crash when double-clicking

Hi Andreas, can you please retry on a more recent driver?
This problem was fixed in 
https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=194685

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 194685 ***

You can try grab the 201 RC3 driver from here:

http://download.eclipse.org/webtools/downloads/drops/R2.0/M-2.0.1RC3-20070921180805/

Download and extract the prereqs and the wtp zip.
Closing. Please feel free to reopen if you don't agree with the duplicate resolution.
